Author: rusted17
Text: As a classically trainer singer my college auditions r the only thing fuckin holdin me back from purging   Likely u didn’t ruin ur voice. Give it a good rest for a few days. Avoid dairy. Drink tea and just let ur voice heal. Ur vocal folds can handle a lot esp as a singer and you’ll b fine as long as u let urself take time to heal

Author: webtrauma
Text: Bro I sing too and every time I purge I have a mini freak out
